name: Frigate
description: Frigate is a complete and local NVR (Network Video Recorder) with realtime AI object detection for CCTV cameras.

notes.text: SemanticSearch is not pre-installed due to high resource requirements (8+ cores, 16-24GB RAM, GPU recommended). Manual configuration required if needed.
OpenVino detector may fail on older CPUs (pre-Haswell/AVX2). If you encounter 'Illegal instruction' errors, consider using alternative detectors.
